text: Rincewind was a coward and an unwitting clown, but he hadn't mastered the art of standing to attention or, rather, Twoflower started to hear the noise it had been making all along. #UnseenAcademicals

passages.fragment: Rincewind was a coward and an unwitting clown , but he had
passages.full_quote: <used>Rincewind was a coward and an unwitting clown, but he had</used> several times saved the world in slightly puzzling circumstances

passages.fragment: , but he had n't mastered the art of standing to attention or , rather ,
passages.full_quote: He'd obviously been waiting for Moist, just like Groat, <used>but he hadn't mastered the art of standing to attention or, rather, h</used>ad only partly understood it

passages.fragment: or , rather , Twoflower started to hear the noise it had been making all along
passages.full_quote: At this stage it began to make a noise, <used>or, rather, Twoflower started to hear the noise it had been making all along</used>
